class.name: ImmediateGeometry
class.description: Draws simple geometry from code. Uses a drawing mode similar to OpenGL 1.x.

method.name: add_sphere
method.description: Simple helper to draw a uvsphere, with given latitudes, longitude and radius.

method.name: add_vertex
method.description: Adds a vertex with the currently set color/uv/etc.

method.name: begin
method.description: Begin drawing (And optionally pass a texture override). When done call end(). For more information on how this works, search for glBegin() glEnd() references. For the type of primitive, use the [Mesh].PRIMITIVE_* enumerations.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears everything that was drawn using begin/end.

method.name: end
method.description: Ends a drawing context and displays the results.

method.name: set_tangent
method.description: The next vertex's tangent (and binormal facing).

method.name: set_uv2
method.description: The next vertex's second layer UV.
